title: Fears grow for missing 15-year-old schoolgirl who has not been seen
text:
Maisie Fox, 15, is six feet tall and described by police as looking older than her age

A teenage schoolgirl has been missing since yesterday evening .

Maisie Fox, 15, is six feet tall and described by police as looking older than her age.

She was last known to be heading in to the centre of Sheffield to meet friends, yesterday.

Her mother dropped her off near the junction of St Mary's Gate and Eyre Street in the city at between 2.30pm and 3pm.

Maisie then spoke to her sister on the phone at 6.45pm, but has not been seen or heard from since.

South Yorkshire Police describe Maisie as being around 6ft tall, medium build, with long brown hair.

She was last seen wearing black leggings, white trainers and a black coat with a black fur hood.

She was carrying a black Michael Kors handbag.

She was last seen wearing black leggings, white trainers and this black coat with a black fur hood, pictured

Police said: 'Maisie is described as looking older than 15 years of age.

'We believe she has friends in Barnsley and may have made her way there during the evening.'

Anyone with information is asked to call 101 with incident number 811 of 6 October.
description: Maisie Fox, 15, is 6ft tall and described by police as looking older than her age. The Sheffield schoolgirl was dropped off in the city centre yesterday and has not been heard from since 6.45pm.
